title: Instruments of the orchestra
creator_credit: Crown Film Unit, Alexander Shaw and Muir Mathieson
brief_description: Featuring the London Symphony Orchestra, this film illustrates the various instruments of the orchestra, describing their use, and concludes with the playing of one of Britten’s compositions.
